channel.title: PkMadness 614 Spawn & Online 24/7
channel.description:
Hi.
Want play a new Rsps called PkMadness.org?
We have Active staff,Great owner, Awesome Updates,Thieving for Cash.
Features: - 1-click interact with players,npcs, and objects! - 100% bank tabs! - 100% Equipment screen (unlike all other 614s) - Item Examining - Token ring that gives you x2 token in pvp! - 100% clan chat with ranks and join requirements - Items kept on death system with 3 items safe on death, skulling and protect item! - 100% Price Checker to value your items - Full friends list with private on/off and split chat colors! - Working item on player! (like christmas cracker) - Full drop system - Many locations to PK Summoning - Bank tabs - Full Working Curse Prayers With - 100% working leeches, Turmoil and SoulSplit - Perfect Hybrid Pking - ClanChat - Webclient With Full Screen Option - Auto Spell Casting - Private message System 100% - Updates everyday - Safe And Non Safe Zones - Earn Your Cash From Killing Players In Safe PVP - Stake People In The Duel Arena - All new item special attacks work 100% I.e Koransi Sword, Claws and All Godswords - Auto Vote Rewards With Vote Shop In-Game - All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars - All Spirit shields working, Even their affects. - Join us now for more to see!
his is the best 614 server out there by far and will continue to get even better as time progresses! You need any help running the server please post on our forums or post on this topic and I will get back to you as soon as possible!
Hope to see you all in-game soon!
FORUM : http://pkmadness.org/
http://www.runelocus.com/images/server_uploads/25791_27470.png http://www.runelocus.com/images/server_uploads/25791_27469.png http://www.runelocus.com/images/server_uploads/25791_27471.png

Hi.

Want play a new Rsps called PkMadness.org?

We have Active staff,Great owner, Awesome Updates,Thieving for Cash.

  • 100% bank tabs!

  • Items kept on death system with 3 items safe on death, skulling and protect item!
  • 100% Price Checker to value your items
  • Full friends list with private on/off and split chat colors!
  • Working item on player! (like christmas cracker)
  • Full drop system
  • Many locations to PK
    Summoning
  • Bank tabs
  • Full Working Curse Prayers With - 100% working leeches, Turmoil and SoulSplit
  • Perfect Hybrid Pking
  • ClanChat
  • Webclient With Full Screen Option
  • Auto Spell Casting
  • Private message System 100%
  • Updates everyday

  • All new item special attacks work 100% I.e Koransi Sword, Claws and All Godswords
  • Auto Vote Rewards With Vote Shop In-Game
  • All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars
  • All Spirit shields working, Even their affects.
  • Join us now for more to see!

his is the best 614 server out there by far and will continue to get even better as time progresses!
You need any help running the server please post on our forums or post on this topic and I will get back to you as soon as possible!
